answers.answer: I know there were questions about down's syndrome, trisomy, etc since I later called my mom to find out how closely related I am to a cousin I know of with down's.

question: So in just a little over a week I will be having my first prenatal doctor appointment! My question to all of you who have already been to yours is- (when it comes to filling out the forms on your partners family health) what are the big ones they are asking for? For example heart disease, diabetes, etc.....my husband is unable to attend and I want to be prepared! Any help is greatly appreciated! Thank you!
title: ? about first doctor appointment
